item.title: GOTCHA!
item.description: New Sturdyblog - GOTCHA CAMERON http://t.co/WDbos3Bx Please read and RT. Thanks.
item.content:encoded: New Sturdyblog - GOTCHA CAMERON http://t.co/WDbos3Bx Please read and RT. Thanks. There’s always a mixture of frustration and glee when mainstream media miss the blindingly obvious, leaving a lowly blogger like me to point it out. Most have focussed on Andy Coulson’s lack of security clearance and BSkyB shares – granted, both important issues. ”No killer blow” have declared BBC correspondents, Sky reporters, journalists, politicos and other assorted lotophagi reviewing the Coulson evidence. I beg to Link - Trackbacks

item.content:encoded: U.S. Military Taught Officers: Use 'Hiroshima' Tactics for 'Total War' on Islam http://t.co/Mglw7tHs Before the U.S. military suspended a course for senior officers on Islam, instructors lectured that a "total war" would be necessary to protect the United States from an Islamic menace. item.content:encoded: MidknightWalker さんが「ポケモンガチ勢がマイナー使いに負けるとこうなる」を作成なう♪ http://t.co/trwqhhgr * 実際そのとおりで、こんだけ考えたPTでロクに考えて組まれてないPTに負けたりしてさぁ。向こうは向こうで「負けて当たり前だろｗｗｗ」みた Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: togetter.com

item.title: Etsy Raises $40 Million for International Expansion
item.description: Etsy Raises $40 Million for International Expansion http://t.co/PBlv7NOC
item.content:encoded: Etsy Raises $40 Million for International Expansion http://t.co/PBlv7NOC Etsy, the online marketplace for handmade and vintage finds, is raising money from venture capitalists to appeal to new markets and users around the globe. Read more... Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: nytimes.com
